mapper.sql: a.id AS "id", a.create_by AS "createBy.id", a.update_by AS "updateBy.id", a.update_date AS "updateDate", a.del_flag AS "delFlag", a.cover_bell_id AS "coverBellId", a.voltage AS "voltage", a.water_level AS "waterLevel", a.temperature AS "temperature", a.signal_value AS "signalValue", a.create_date AS "createDate", a.remarks AS "remarks"
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO cover_bell_state( id, create_by, update_by, update_date, del_flag, cover_bell_id, voltage, water_level, temperature, signal_value, create_date, remarks ) VALUES ( #{id}, #{createBy.id}, #{updateBy.id}, #{updateDate}, #{delFlag}, #{coverBellId}, #{voltage}, #{waterLevel}, #{temperature}, #{signalValue}, #{createDate}, #{remarks} )
mapper.update: UPDATE cover_bell_state SET update_by = #{updateBy.id}, update_date = #{updateDate}, cover_bell_id = #{coverBellId}, voltage = #{voltage}, water_level = #{waterLevel}, temperature = #{temperature}, signal_value = #{signalValue}, remarks = #{remarks} WHERE id = #{id}
mapper.select: select a.* FROM cover_bell_state a where ${propertyName} = '${value}'
